ModMetaData.name: TD Enhancement Pack
ModMetaData.author: Uuugggg
ModMetaData.description:
Various things that just should be in the game.
(Also check the settings in-game for feature list)
Overlays for unbuildable areas, terrain fertility, and lighting. Trade and negotiation dialogs can pause after closing. Level-up arrows indicate skill learning in Character Tab. Zone/Stockpile size count, accounting fertility. Empty/Fully grown plant count. Areas can be reordered, recolored, and copy/pasted in the area manager Make an area named 'Never Home' and the area will never be added to the Home Area (various) selected items are given a count Food 'rotted away' messages are clickable to see where it was Popup messages like '% recruit chance' (text motes) stay onscreen in realtime, so they don't dissappear at high speeds Camera Panning at low framerates is fixed: Panning moves and slows to a stop at real-time speed instead of game framerate
Sleeping enemies won't be targeted by your pawns (while undrafted) A stop button for your pawns. Because, sometimes you want them to stop.
